OOP

Class Spreadsheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • OOP.Spreadsheet

  • public class Spreadsheet
extends java.util.Observable
    Spreadsheet is the Class that holds all the Cells in an ArrayList. It is the model class and handles the reading and writing of the xml files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Spreadsheet()
      Constructor.

      This method checks if the Object is a Cell object.

      This method will return the Cell object that is on index i.
      Cell getCellAt(int row, int col)
      Returns the cell at the specified row and column.
      java.util.ArrayList<Cell> getCells()
      Returns the spreadsheet's list of Cells
      static Spreadsheet readXML(java.lang.String filename)
      Reads the contents of the xml file and creates Cells which it puts in the ArrayList
      int size()
      This method returns the size of this
      void writeXML(java.lang.String filename)
      This methode makes a Document with all the values and Nodes of this.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Spreadsheet

        public Spreadsheet()
        Constructor. Makes a private ArrayList with Cell objects

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(java.lang.Object cell)
        This method checks if the Object is a Cell object. If this is true it will add the cell to the ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        Object - Cell

      • get

        public Cell get(int index)
        This method will return the Cell object that is on index i.
        Parameters:
        int - index
        Returns:
        Cell on index

      • size

        public int size()
        This method returns the size of this
        Returns:
        int size

      • readXML

        public static Spreadsheet readXML(java.lang.String filename)
        Reads the contents of the xml file and creates Cells which it puts in the ArrayList
        Parameters:
        String - - the filename
        Returns:
        Spreadsheet

      • writeXML

        public void writeXML(java.lang.String filename)
        This methode makes a Document with all the values and Nodes of this. It then writes this to a xml- file with the @param name.
        Parameters:
        String - filename

      • getCells

        public java.util.ArrayList<Cell> getCells()
        Returns the spreadsheet's list of Cells
        Returns:
        ArrayList ArrayList containing the cells.

      • getCellAt

        public Cell getCellAt(int row,
             int col)
        Returns the cell at the specified row and column. If there is no cell at the specified location, null is returned
        Parameters:
        row - int: row number of requested cell
        col - int: column number of requested cell
        Returns:
        Cell: cell at the specified location
